model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
A new cat arrived at the shelter. He is very cute, but not cuter than puppies!
Why do you like puppies so much?  What's so different about kittens and puppies?  Aren't they just both babies?  
Yes but puppies are just so cute with their beady eyes and always wagging their tails and following you everywhere!
You have a point.  It is nice to see puppies wagging their tail and just following you!  Changing topics, do you have any recipes with asparagus?  You know, it's such a popular vegetable, but I just don't know how to prepare it.
I don't have recipes but I know how to make a good grilled asparagus. Are you looking to bolster your chef book?
I sure am!  Grilled asparagus does sound good.  Do you pair the grilled asparagus with your fajitas?  What do you prefer, chicken or beef fajitas?
I prefer chicken to beef. I pair it with beef fajitas andI think it's great to have with a glass of merlot. Do you like wine?
You're making me hungry!  Yes, I do love wine.  As a matter of fact, I used to live in the Bordeaux region in France, so my favorite wine is Bordeaux wine.  But I also love champagne and cognac.
Haha, I know right? I lived in the Champagne region for a bit! Always wanted to go to Bordeaux. How was it there?

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Introduction and Interests', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A and Speaker B discuss their interests and hobbies.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: Hello! How are you? ### Speaker B: I am good, how about you? ### Speaker A: Doing good. I invent things what do you do? ### Speaker B: I'm a workaholic. Do you like music? I like listening to black sabbath. ### Speaker A: I am more into science than music. ### Speaker B: That's interesting. What about your hobbies? ### Speaker A: Mainly I just invent things I like to teleport myself around the world.. ### Speaker B: Cool. I like grilling, because I like eating meat. ### Speaker A: My current project is a time machine. Have you ever traveled in time? ### Speaker B: I haven't. Mainly I just think about how much I have at work. ### Speaker A: What type of work do you do?' }(2) {'Related Topics': 'Cooking and Food Preferences', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A and Speaker B share their food preferences and discuss potential collaborations in cooking.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: I prefer mexican food and seafood. Chicken enchiladas, tacos, shrimp shish kabob... Any baked fish. I like it all. If you are going to grill, maybe grilled corn and stuffed burgers ### Speaker B: Ugh that sounds like a plan. Maybe we can teleport around the world and I'll cook different types of cuisines?  ### Speaker A: Oh that would be the best thing ever! I love trying new food! Cooking is a science ya know! ### Speaker B: Ain't that the truth! Do you have any puppies by the way? ### Speaker A: I used to foster puppies, but I am too busy now to deal with them all the time. I do however visit shelters in every city I go to! ### Speaker B: Oh how cool. Are you an animal person? ### Speaker A: Of course! Puppies are my favorite, but dogs are cool too. It is nice to get to meet as many as possible while jumping from place to place. Maybe when I can move through space and time, I can go meet all the puppies from history!! ### Speaker B: But what about the kittens??? ### Speaker A: Have you had any time off for grilling? ### Speaker B: not really yet. I'm hoping I can grill this weekend though.  ### Speaker A: Do you have anything yummy planned out? It's raining here so I may do some indoor grilled veggies for fajitas. :) ### Speaker B: maybe some steaks. need to figure out a good side to go with it. ### Speaker A: Do you like grilled asparagus? I put a little lemon on mine and it's delicious.  ### Speaker B: I've never had it but definitely something to consider.  ### Speaker A: Usually people either really love it or hate it. Have you considered getting a job as a line cook?' }
```
